scripts.export:psd:iphone15: magick convert "public/iPhone 15 Pro Max Mockup 05/Mockup.psd[0]" public/img/iphone15-frame.png
scripts.export:psd:iphone17: magick convert "public/iPhone 17 Pro Max Mockup 01/Mockup.psd[0]" public/img/iphone17-frame.png
scripts.export:psd:ipad2020: magick convert "public/2020 iPad Pro Mockup 01/Mockup.psd[0]" public/img/ipad2020-frame.png
scripts.export:psd:all: npm run export:psd:iphone15 && npm run export:psd:iphone17 && npm run export:psd:ipad2020
